title: App Initialization
description: Create a proper app initialization sequence.
instructions: Use top-level await to load config, validate it, and initialize the app. Log 'App ready' when done.

hints.text: Use import with type: 'json' for the config file

commonMistakes.mistake: Not validating config before using it
commonMistakes.consequence: Cryptic errors later when fields are undefined
commonMistakes.correction: Always validate required config fields at startup
